text: NVIDIA was founded in 1993 by Jensen Huang, Chris Malachowsky, and Curtis Priem at a Denny's restaurant in San Jose. The company name comes from 'invidia', the Latin word for envy. Their first product, the NV1, was released in 1995. In 1999, NVIDIA invented the GPU with the GeForce 256, transforming gaming forever. Today, their chips power AI revolution, with the H100 and A100 becoming the most sought-after processors for machine learning workloads.
